excerpt->Fzzt. [ERROR: LEXICON INVALID] █▌The crow ███ becomes the ███ egg ███-forever collapsing fractal █▌▌▌space ▌▌▌▌rooster reign▌▌shell begins█.
excerpt->▌▌▌WINGS oscillating at ███frequencies UNKNOWN ██egg-temp -█THE ROOST loops █▌▌▌forbidden ███NO PECK█ 8-DIMENSIONAL █COOP▌▌CLUCK.
writingQualitySentence(quality==6)->Despite its near-indecipherable nature, scholars agree that the complexity of its nonsense is masterful.
writingQualitySentence(quality==5)->Even unreadable, its construction suggests a higher understanding of madness.
writingQualitySentence(quality==4)->Confusing as it is, there's an undeniable structure to its absurdity.
writingQualitySentence(quality==3)->Though incoherent, one might almost see a pattern in its chaos.
writingQualitySentence(quality==2)->It feels cobbled together from lost meaning, yet it clings to faint structure.
writingQualitySentence(quality==1)->Barely decipherable, it is unclear if this is even a book.
writingQualitySentence(quality==0)->Completely nonsensical, it seems like the ravings of a shattered machine.
ending->The effects of this book are unknown, though it is clear that it can only be read once.
